review_data.title: Great atmosphere
review_data.content: Great atmosphere coupled with friendly staff. The private dining room is excellent (in the cellar surrounded by bottles of wine). Food is excellent and it also has a good wine list.

review_data.title: Great place for a lovely food and nice atmosphere

review_data.title: Excellent food with style
review_data.content: It is my first time trying out this restaurant and I was not just surprised by the good food, but also by the nice interior and the lovely service. We tried the burger and the club sandwich. Both dishes were excellent - and believe me,...More

review_data.title: Klasse Veganer Burger!

review_data.title: Very attentive service and kind staff
review_data.content: Me and my friends come at least once a week and always feel like at home. Super nice staff, great food and amazing drinks! Can definitely recommend. ;)

review_data.title: One of the best burgers in town
review_data.content: Even if the atmosphere is too high stand to be called an irish pub, this place offers one of the best burgers in town. Furthermore, the beer choice is really good as well!

review_data.title: Irish bar by name only

review_data.title: Walked 20 minutes to get here
review_data.content: Walked 20 minutes to get here having searched for bars that were open only to find that the whole place is closed due to a private party!! The staff didn’t give a damn! Rude and uninviting. I won’t ever go back!!

review_data.title: To Paraphrase Joyce...Meh.

review_data.title: Superb

review_data.title: Our first lunch in Zurich.
review_data.content: A very traditional bar/restaurant, great food with an array of drinks to compliment whatever you choose to eat, service impeccable.

review_data.title: A favourite
review_data.content: Not cheap but this is Zürich and the JJ is worth it. Wonderful atmosphere, lots of space, truly brilliant staff and great food. When I want to relax and enjoy the ambience, I go to the James Joyce. Never been disappointed.

review_data.title: Yummy Lunch in Fantastic Setting

review_data.title: Nice pub to have drinks with colleagues

review_data.title: Good atmosphere!

review_data.title: have a great G&T or anything else

review_data.title: Inspiration in decor, ambience, and libations.

review_data.title: My favorite pub on the way home
review_data.content: My favorite pub on the way home from work. Eat or just have a glass of wine and some Tzüriiiwasser (big selection of beer of course for beer drinkers). Hang out - friendly staff who remember their clients. Very friendly and welcoming place.

review_data.title: City centre pub/cafe

review_data.title: Great place to go with business colleagues

review_data.title: Excellent pub

review_data.title: Great Place for Lunch in Downtown Zurich
review_data.content: James Joyce is a great place for a business lunch in downtown Zurich. Stop by the Tesla shop which is next door. It has a pub like atmosphere, good food and attentive/friendly service.

review_data.title: For James Joyce scholars and others who need a drink
review_data.content: The Zurich James Joyce Foundation was located just across the Bahnhofstrasse from the James Joyce Pub, and we all knew this pub had been brought over stick by stone from Dublin. Having more money now than I did then, I stopped in for--no, not a...More

review_data.title: Burger vom Feinsten.
review_data.content: Selten so gute Burgers in Zürich genossen. Toll angerichtet, knusprige Pommes dazu. Und als Plus die sehr nette Bedienung. Nebenbei:...More

review_data.title: Best Pub
review_data.content: Wunderbare Weinauswahl im Offenausschank, Fleischkäse mit Spiegelei & die besten Burger der Stadt! Toelles Ambiente und flotte Bedienung

review_data.title: Nice Interior - Rest Average
review_data.content: The bank across the street that owns the pub has invested quite some money for the interior. Unfortunately the rest is average: service quality, food, outside seating are not worth a visit. Prices on upper Zurich level. Fun factor way below a "traditional" Irish place.

review_data.title: Fett-triefender und fader Burger mit Schweinefleisch - ich komme ein paar Jahre nicht mehr
review_data.content: Einer der Serviceangestellten ist superfreundlich, alle anderen haben nicht verstanden, woher ihr Lohn kommt. Die Karte am Abend ist sehr...More

review_data.title: Irish Eyes
review_data.content: Good atmosphere with a good selection of whiskey.... Service a little brusque however they were very busy that night!

review_data.title: Well Worth the Visit
review_data.content: Good decor and atmosphere. Plus good food and service. Nice seating set up. Enjoyed my lunch. I would eat there again.

review_data.title: Stylish English Pub - recommeded for lunch, afterwork drinks and apéros
review_data.content: The James Joyce is always a good choice! It is normally very busy for lunch time, so make sure you make a reservation. Their beef tartare is probably one of the best and their burger definitely the best in town! In addition to beer they...More

review_data.title: Art Nouveau gem
review_data.content: I had tried on a number of previous visits to Zurich to visit this bar but without success. It must have the strangest opening hours of any Irish pub in the world: closed at 6.00 p.m. on Saturday and all day Sunday! But this time...More

review_data.title: Best burger in town
review_data.content: Excellent place, for once the hausgemachte adj is not used in vain for the hamburger. Well priced and very central.

review_data.title: Great pub in the center of Zurich!
review_data.content: We have been there for lunch a week ago. The atmosphere was really nice and our meals were delicious. It is easy to find it and the location is ideal if you are looking for a restaurant in the city center. I would definitely go...More

review_data.title: A very good burger in a very classy restaurant/bar setting
review_data.content: I arrived before the lunch crowd and was seated at the bar. A very open restaurant with high bar tables at the entry, comfy bar stools at the marble counter and large green padded seats in the main seating area of the restaurant. The restaurant...More

review_data.title: Awesome burger!
review_data.content: Popped in here for lunch and decided to make it a big one. I ordered a special hamburger which had a slice of duck liver on top of the beef patty and portwine sauce...great stuff!

review_data.title: Great bar with live jazz every second Monday during spring/summer/autumn
review_data.content: Very cosy and nice pub, cool atmosphere and kind service. Live jazz concert (free entry) every second Monday during summer months.

review_data.title: Top 3 burgers in Zurich
review_data.content: If you really want a great burger, a great beer and great atmosphere, this is a very nice stop. Lots of bankers after work ours, so call ahead for a table. During the summers, tables outside are even better.

review_data.title: Empfehlenswert
